DataElement.preferredName: Symptom Distress Scale Bowel Pattern Score 5 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Person's stated observation of the degree of distress they experience related to their bowel pattern, using a five-point Likert scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Symptom Distress Scale Bowel Pattern Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A patient reported questionnaire composed of rating scales developed to measure the degree of distress experienced by the patient for specific symptoms._A question about the pattern of an individual's bowel movements._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A patient reported questionnaire composed of rating scales developed to measure the degree of distress experienced by the patient for specific symptoms.

Concepts.definition: A patient reported questionnaire composed of rating scales developed to measure the degree of distress experienced by the patient for specific symptoms.

Property.preferredDefinition: A question about the pattern of an individual's bowel movements.:A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

Concepts.definition: A question about the pattern of an individual's bowel movements.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

ValueDomain.preferredName: Symptom Distress Scale Bowel Pattern Score 5 Point Scale
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Numeric scores from 1 (I have my normal bowel pattern) to 5 (I am in almost constant discomfort because of my bowel pattern) on a Likert scale used on the Symptom Distress Scale questionnaire.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: I am in almost constant discomfort because of my bowel pattern

ValueMeaning.preferredName: I am in almost constant discomfort because of my bowel pattern
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual's pattern of bowel movements causes or caused them almost constant discomfort.

Concepts.longName: In Almost Constant Discomfort Because of Bowel Pattern
Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual's pattern of bowel movements causes or caused them almost constant discomfort.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: I am usually in considerable discomfort because of my present bowel pattern

ValueMeaning.preferredName: I am usually in considerable discomfort because of my present bowel pattern
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual's present pattern of bowel movements usually causes them considerable discomfort.

Concepts.longName: Usually in Considerable Discomfort Because of Bowel Pattern
Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual's present pattern of bowel movements usually causes them considerable discomfort.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: My present bowel pattern occasionally causes me considerable discomfort

ValueMeaning.preferredName: My present bowel pattern occasionally causes me considerable discomfort
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual's present pattern of bowel movements occasionally causes them considerable discomfort.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual's present pattern of bowel movements occasionally causes them considerable discomfort.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: My bowel pattern occasionally causes me some discomfort

ValueMeaning.preferredName: My bowel pattern occasionally causes me some discomfort
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual's pattern of bowel movements occasionally causes or caused them some discomfort.

Concepts.longName: Bowel Pattern Occasionally Causes Some Discomfort
Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual's pattern of bowel movements occasionally causes or caused them some discomfort.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: I have my normal bowel pattern

ValueMeaning.preferredName: I have my normal bowel pattern
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual has or had a normal pattern of bowel movements.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual has or had a normal pattern of bowel movements.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

Concepts.definition: An ordered reference standard used to measure incremental changes.

ReferenceDocuments.name: SDS User's Manual
ReferenceDocuments.description: Documentation of the development, method of administration,  scoring procedures and psychometric properties of the SDS.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Using PRO/HRQoL Measures
ReferenceDocuments.description: This data element is part of a full set of items that comprise a PRO/HRQoL measure. The full set must be used without any changes to the questions or value set in order to retain the validity and reliability associated with the measure.  The URL citation is provided so that caDSR users can obtain materials related to instructions for administering and/or scoring the measure. Changes may not be made to these documents.  Where an investigator wants to use single Patient Reported Outcome items that are integrated into a study, DCP review is required prior to inclusion of the item on a case report form.
